mapper.insert: insert into `doctor`(name, age, sex, level_id, phone, account_id, type_id, createtime, updatetime) values (#{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{levelId}, #{phoneNumber}, #{accountId}, #{typeId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update `doctor` set name=#{name}, age=#{age}, sex=#{sex}, level_id=#{levelId}, phone=#{phoneNumber}, type_id=#{typeId}, updatetime=#{updateTime} where id = #{id}
